solution_line_template: After Ricky's little sister takes {stolen_roses} roses, Ricky has {initial_roses} - {stolen_roses} = <<{initial_roses}-{stolen_roses}={remaining_roses}>>{remaining_roses} roses
Ricky can give each person {remaining_roses} / {num_people} = <<{remaining_roses}/{num_people}={roses_per_person}>>{roses_per_person} roses
